title: Find the Common Denominator
text: We can rewrite $$\frac{8y}{y^2-16}$$ as $$\frac{8y}{\left(y-4\right) \left(y+4\right)}$$, what is the least common denominator for $$\frac{8y}{\left(y-4\right) \left(y+4\right)}-\frac{4}{y-4}$$?

title: Rewrite the Expression

title: Simplify the Expression
text: According to the above steps, we can rewrite $$\frac{8y}{y^2-16}-\frac{4}{y-4}$$ as $$\frac{4y-16}{\left(y+4\right) \left(y-4\right)}$$, are there any ways to simplify the new expression?
speech: According to the above steps, we can rewrite  fraction, 8 y, over, y squared minus 16,  minus fraction, 4 over, y minus 4,   as  fraction, 4 y minus 16, over, parentheses y plus 4,  times, parentheses y minus 4, ,  , are there any ways to simplify the new expression?

as   fraction, 4 y minus 16, over,  y plus 4,  times,  y minus 4, ,
, are there any ways to simplify the new expression?

title: Simplify the Expression
text: Yes, we can further factor the numerator $$4y-16$$ as $$4\left(y-4\right)$$. So $$\frac{4y-16}{\left(y+4\right) \left(y-4\right)}$$ can be rewritten as $$\frac{4\left(y-4\right)}{\left(y+4\right) \left(y-4\right)}$$. What is the simplified form of $$\frac{4\left(y-4\right)}{\left(y+4\right) \left(y-4\right)}$$?
speech: Yes, we can further factor the numerator  4 y minus 16  as , 4 times, parentheses y minus 4,  . What is the simplified form of  fraction, 4 times, parentheses y minus 4, , over, parentheses y plus 4,  times, parentheses y minus 4, ,  ?
